name: react-native-androidtv-remote
description: Port of AndroidTV Remote to react native

scripts.babel: babel ./src/*.* --out-dir dist --delete-dir-on-start -D && babel ./src/certificate/*.* --out-dir dist/certificate -D && babel ./src/pairing/*.* --out-dir dist/pairing -D && babel ./src/remote/*.* --out-dir dist/remote -D && babel ./src/network/*.* --out-dir dist/network -D
scripts.build:reinstall-js: cd example && rm -rf node_modules && yarn cache clean && yarn install
scripts.build:reinstall-pod: cd example/ios && rm -rf Pods build && rm -f Podfile.lock && pod cache clean --all && pod install
scripts.start:ios: cd example && lsof -ti:8081 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; npx react-native start --port 8081 --reset-cache & sleep 3 && yarn ios --device
scripts.build:ios-full: yarn babel && yarn build:reinstall-js && yarn build:reinstall-pod && yarn start:ios
scripts.build:ios: yarn babel && cd example && rm -rf node_modules && yarn install && cd ios && rm -rf Pods && pod install && cd .. && yarn ios --device && cd ..
scripts.debug:netstat-logs: while true; do netstat -an | grep 192.168.2.150.6467 | ts '%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'; sleep 1; done > netstat-logs_$(date +%Y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S).txt

author: @vricosti
